> Introduction
> Comment
> variable
> datatype
    > integer --> int()
    > float ---> float()
    > string --> str()
    > list---> list()
    > tuple ---> tuple()
    > set ---> set()
    > frozenset---> frozenset()
    > dictionary ---> dict()
    > complex ---> complex()
    > boolean---> bool()
> casting
> operators
> input()
> conditional programming:
    > if else
    > nested if else
    > if elif else
    > nested if elif else
    > ternary operator 
> Loop
    > for loop 
        > range()
        > iterable
        > single for loop
        > nested for loop 
        > pattern using single for loop 
        > pattern using nested for loop
        > list comprehension 
        > set comprehension 
        > dictionary comprehension 
        > tuple comprehension (gernerator object)
    > while loop
        > single while loop 
        > nested while loop
        > pattern using single while loop
        > pattern using nested while loop 

> functions
    > lambda function(annonymous function)   
    > def function 
    > nested function 
    > decorator
    > generator 

> Package and Module
> Multitasking
> garbage collector (gc module)
> OOP:
    > class(blueprint)
    > object
    > instance variable
    > class variable 
    > Inheritance 
    > polymorphism
    > encapsulation
    > Abstraction

Database:

SQL:
    Mysql(CRUD)

NoSQL:
    Mongodb(CRUD)
